scope: Complete Oslo Kommune systems relevant for developers

origo_datasets.name: labs.oslo.kommune.no
origo_datasets.description: Origo labs Enonic XP application

origo_datasets.name: bydelsfakta
origo_datasets.description: Bydelsfakta is a frontend application for Oslo municipality which visualises demographic statistics and data on various topics for the 15 districts in the City of Oslo.

origo_datasets.name: okdata-cli
origo_datasets.description: Command line interface to the services provided by Oslo Origo's Dataplatform

origo_datasets.name: okdata-sdk-python
origo_datasets.description: Python SDK for Origo Dataplatform

origo_datasets.name: origo-hackathon-tla-bot
origo_datasets.description: Simplest possible TLA (Three letter acronym/abbreviation) bot.

origo_datasets.name: origo-testing-workshop
origo_datasets.description: Workshop om testing

origo_datasets.name: dataplatform-probe
origo_datasets.description: Monitoring service for dataplatform services and events

origo_datasets.name: dataplatform-prometheus
origo_datasets.description: Builds Prometheus bundled with our config for scraping of metrics. Migrated to https://github.com/oslokommune/dataplatform-config/tree/main/docker/prometheus

origo_datasets.name: dataplatform-pipeline-alerts-email
origo_datasets.description: Sends alerts about failing pipelines as an email

origo_datasets.name: helsedata-public
origo_datasets.description: Offentlig tilgjengelig informasjon for helsedata satsning

origo_datasets.name: okdata-aws
origo_datasets.description: Collection of helpers for working with AWS Lambda

origo_datasets.name: okdata-pipeline
origo_datasets.description: Collection of pipeline components for Origo Dataplattform

origo_datasets.name: okdata-resource-auth
origo_datasets.description: Dataplatform resource authorizer

origo_datasets.name: serverless-blueprints
origo_datasets.description: Blueprints that can be used as starting points for Serverless applications in Oslo Origo

origo_datasets.name: dataplatform-status-api
origo_datasets.description: CRUD API for status på opplastede filer

origo_datasets.name: bydelsfakta-api
origo_datasets.description: API for Bydelsfakta

origo_datasets.name: okdata-common-jvm
origo_datasets.description: Common JVM library for the Origo Dataplatform

origo_datasets.name: gjenbruksstasjoner-kotid-api
origo_datasets.description: Lambda function providing an API for Gjenbruksstasjoner Køtid Frontend, using Flask and Flask-RESTful.

origo_datasets.name: gjenbruksstasjoner-kotid-frontend
origo_datasets.description: Vue-app that shows information from gjenbruksstasjoner-queue-predictions-api

origo_datasets.name: okdata-event-collector
origo_datasets.description: Lambda functions to put a list of records on a Kinesis stream. Obsolete as of 2022-05-16.

origo_datasets.name: okdata-data-exporter
origo_datasets.description: AWS Lambda function for generating a list of presigned S3 URLs from a dataset ID

origo_datasets.name: dataplatform-batch-jobs
origo_datasets.description: Collection of batch jobs for the dataplatform

origo_datasets.name: okdata-state-machine-event
origo_datasets.description: Act on state machine events from CloudWatch. Migrated to https://github.com/oslokommune/dataplatform-status-api.

origo_datasets.name: okdata-metadata-api
origo_datasets.description: API for posting, updating and retrieving metadata in the dataplatform

origo_datasets.name: okdata-event-data-subscription
origo_datasets.description: Subscription manager for events (WebSockets)

origo_datasets.name: okdata-permission-api
origo_datasets.description: API for managing permissions to okdata resources

origo_datasets.name: okdata-data-uploader
origo_datasets.description: AWS Lambda function for generating presigned URLs and form fields used to upload files to S3

origo_datasets.name: okdata-elasticsearch-queries
origo_datasets.description: Proxy-thingy for Elasticsearch queries

origo_datasets.name: okdata-token-service
origo_datasets.description: REST API for generating user tokens with Keycloak

origo_datasets.name: okdata-event-stream-api
origo_datasets.description: REST API for creating and managing event streams and sending data to event streams. Obsolete as of 2022-05-20.

origo_datasets.name: okdata-pipeline-jvm
origo_datasets.description: Collection of JVM pipeline components for Origo dataplattform

origo_datasets.name: okdata-badetemperatur-api
origo_datasets.description: Lambda functions to collect and expose water temperatures in Oslo. This API is deprecated (2022-05-11).

origo_datasets.name: okdata-maskinporten-api
origo_datasets.description: REST API for managing clients and keys in Maskinporten and synchronization with AWS SSM

origo_datasets.name: origo-teknologiradar
origo_datasets.description: A library that generates an interactive radar, inspired by http://thoughtworks.com/radar/

origo_datasets.name: fastapi-demo
origo_datasets.description: FastAPI demo app. Migrated to https://github.com/oslokommune/serverless-blueprints

origo_datasets.name: okdata-log-group-subscriber
origo_datasets.description: Auto-subscribe to CloudWatch Log Groups

origo_datasets.name: origourls
origo_datasets.description: URL-shortener to give permanent human readable names to google meet ( or other stuff! )

sources: Teknisk reglement for vann og avløp

developer_recommendations: Start med å etablere kontakt med dataplattform@oslo.kommune.no for Origo-tilgang
Få oversikt over gjeldende reguleringsplaner i ditt område via planinnsyn
Undersøk byggesaksarkivet for lignende prosjekter i området
Kontakt PBE for forhåndskonferanse og avklaring av krav
Sjekk infrastrukturavgifter og gebyrer tidlig i prosessen
Vurder utbyggingsavtaler og tekniske krav for området
Få tilgang til eiendomsdata og matrikkeldata
Undersøk temaplaner som kan påvirke prosjektet
